game.name: Battlefield™ REDSEC
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, HDR available
game.shortDescription: Battlefield의 상징적인 DNA로 구축된 궁극의 무료 플레이 FPS 거점인 REDSEC에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 배틀 로얄, 건틀릿, Portal의 힘을 선보입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Now entering REDSEC, the ultimate free-to-play FPS destination built on Battlefield’s iconic DNA. Featuring Battle Royale, Gauntlet, & the power of Portal.

reviewHighlights.text: AI generated SLOP in a PAID BATTLE PASS? Absolutely not. Uninstalled the entire game, never returning to EA. Clearly this is how our franchises are go...
Shut this disgrace down! Stop paying streamers, stop adding daily quests to the main game's Battle Pass! Nobody needs this game. Players want large-sc...
